lines.value: leif erikson atau leif ericson (; ; islandia leifur eiriksson norwegia leiv eiriksson s 970 &ndash s 1020 adalah seorang penjelajah islandia yang dianggap oleh beberapa orang sebagai orang eropa pertama yang mendarat di amerika utara kecuali greenland sebelum christopher columbus

lines.value: my use of the word hierarchy in the subtitle of this work is meant to be provocative

lines.value: there is a strong theoretical need to contrast hierarchy with the more widespread use of the words class and state careless use of these terms can produce a dangerous simplification of social reality

lines.value: to use the words hierarchy class and state interchangeably as many social theorists do is insidious and obscurantist

lines.value: this practice in the name of a classless or libertarian society could easily conceal the existence of hierarchical relationships and a hierarchical sensibility both of which even in the absence of economic exploitation or political coercion would serve to perpetuate unfreedom murray bookchin

lines.value: the ecology of freedom the emergence and dissolution of hierarchy

lines.value: 3 individualist anarchist benjamin tucker defined anarchism as opposition to authority as follows they found that they must turn either to the right or to the left - follow either the path of authority or the path of liberty
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: marx went one way warren and proudhon the other
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: thus were born state socialism and anarchism authority takes many shapes but broadly speaking her enemies divide themselves into three classes first those who abhor her both as a means and as an end of progress opposing her openly avowedly sincerely consistently universally second those who profess to believe in her as a means of progress but who accept her only so far as they think she will subserve their own selfish interests denying her and her blessings to the rest of the world third those who distrust her as a means of progress believing in her only as an end to be obtained by first trampling upon violating and outraging her
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: these three phases of opposition to liberty are met in almost every sphere of thought and human activity
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: representatives of the first are seen in the catholic church and the russian autocracy of the second in the protestant church and the manchester school of politics and political economy of the third in the atheism of gambetta and the socialism of karl marx benjamin tucker
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: namun penemuan naskah papirus yang sekarang disimpan di magdalen college oxford inggris menunjukkan bahwa injil matius ini sudah selesai ditulis sebelum tahun 66.irenaeus menulis : matius sekali lagi mengisahkan penjelmaan nya yesus sebagai seorang manusia katanya inilah silsilah yesus kristus anak daud anak abraham dan juga ‘ kelahiran yesus kristus adalah seperti berikut jadi ini adalah injil kemanusiaan nya dengan alasan itu juga karakter manusia yang rendah hati dan lembut ini terus dinyatakan dalam seluruh injil melawan ajaran sesat 3.11.8 epifanius atau epiphanius ~320-403 m yang hidup sezaman dengan hieronimus =jerome menulis dalam catatannya panarion bahwa matius menulis injil dalam bahasa yunani yang dikutipnya dan dengan jelas ia menggunakan frasa baku yang menyatakan status pengarang
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: : 5 dan pengikut pengikut sisanya dari juruselamat kita keduabelas rasul ketujuh puluh murid dan yang lain yang tak terhitung bukannya tidak tahu akan hal hal tersebut
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: namun dari semua murid murid tuhan hanya matius dan yohanes yang meninggalkan kenangan tertulis dan mereka menurut tradisi didorong untuk menulis hanya karena tekanan kebutuhan
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: 6 karena matius yang mulanya memberitakan kepada orang ibrani ketika ia hendak pergi ke bangsa lain menekadkan untuk menulis injilnya dalam bahasa daerahnya sehingga mengkompensasi mereka yang harus ditinggalkannya atas kehilangan kehadirannya
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: 7 dan ketika markus dan lukas sudah menerbitkan injil injil mereka mereka berkata bahwa yohanes yang telah menggunakan seluruh waktunya untuk memberitakan injil secara lisan akhirnya terdorong untuk menuliskannya dengan alasan berikut
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: ketiga injil tersebut sebelumnya telah sampai ke tangan semua orang dan ke tangannya juga mereka berkata ia menerima mereka dan memberi kesaksian atas kebenaran mereka tetapi ada kekurangan dalam mereka kisah perbuatan yang dilakukan oleh kristus pada permulaan pelayanan nya
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: 8 dan ini memang benar
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karena terbukti bahwa ketiga penginjil hanya mencatat perbuatan yang dilakukan sang juruselamat setahun setelah yohanes pembaptis dipenjarakan dan mengindikasikan hal ini pada catatan mereka
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: 9 karena matius setelah empat puluh hari puasa dan pencobaan yang mengikutinya mengindikasikan kronologi pekerjaan nya ketika ia berkata maka ketika ia mendengar bahwa yohanes dipenjarakan ia meninggalkan yudea dan pergi ke galilea
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: 10 markus juga mengatakan yang sama maka setelah yohanes dipenjarakan yesus datang ke galilea dan lukas sebelum memulai kisahnya mengenai perbuatan yesus mencatat waktu sedemikian ketika ia berkata bahwa herodes menambah semua perbuatan jahat yang telah dilakukannya memasukkan yohanes ke dalam penjara eusebius church history 3.24.5-8)jika diteliti dapat dilihat bahwa eusebius merujuk kepada injil matius dalam bahasa ibrani pada ayat 5-7 sebagai salah satu dari ketiga injil tersebut sebelumnya tetapi ia merujuk kepada injil matius dalam bahasa yunani ketika ia berkata “ telah sampai ke tangan semua orang satu satunya kemungkinan adalah eusebius menganggap kedua versi itu sebagai satu karya versi ibrani dan yunani dari satu injil matius
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: dapat dipahami benar jika injil matius bahasa yunani merupakan terjemahan yang dikembangkan dari injil matius bahasa ibrani keduanya ditulis oleh matius
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: pada ayat 9-10 ia membandingkan tulisan tulisan matius dengan markus dan lukas menggunakan frasa serupa yang menyatakan kepengarangan semua empat penginjil sementara mengutip dari injil matius bahasa yunani
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: thomas dan farnell setuju dengan kesimpulan ini ketika mereka berkomentar tentang nas eusebius ini 3.24.5-10 :"meskipun eusebius menyebutkan bahwa matius pertama kali menulis dalam bahasa ibrani ia juga menganggap injil matius bahasa yunani juga sampai ke tangan sang rasul yohanes
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: ia mencatat bahwa yohanes tahu mengenai injil matius markus dan lukas serta mengakui keakuratan mereka ketika ia menyusun injilnya sendiri

lines.value: eusebius merujuk kepada bagian bagian injil matius bahasa yunani dan menyebut sang rasul matius sebagai pengarangnya

lines.value: dalam injil ini hanya terdapat sedikit fakta yang dapat menunjukkan kapan tulisan ini dibuat sehingga tanggal dan tempat injil ini berasal tidak dapat dipastikan

lines.value: beberapa ahli konservatif memiliki alasan kuat untuk memperkirakan bahwa ia ditulis sebelum yerusalem dihancurkan antara tahun 60 sampai 65 ketika matius berada di palestina atau antiokia di siria meskipun ada pakar liberal yang memperkirakan antara tahun 180 dan 200
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: semua ahli sepakat bahwa tulisan tulisan ignatius merujuk namun tidak mengutip langsung injil matius yang berarti injil ini sudah selesai ditulis pada awal abad ke 2 masehi
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: penemuan naskah naskah papirus the oxford papyri oleh prof casten peter thiede memberi bukti kuat bahwa injil matius ditulis sebelum tahun 65 m di antara naskah naskah tersebut ditemukan 3 lembar yang berisi ayat ayat dari injil matius pasal 26 tentang pengurapan yesus di rumah simon si kusta di betania dan pengkhianatannya oleh yudas iskariot

lines.value: di antara naskah naskah itu juga ditemukan surat dari seorang petani bernama harmiysis yang mengajukan banding pada pengadilan romawi untuk menambah jumlah ternaknya dengan menyebut tanggal tahun ke 12 kaisar nero epeieph 30 atau pada penanggalan gregorian 24 juli 65/66 m sejumlah sarjana alkitab percaya bahwa injil ini merupakan injil yang pertama ditulis sedangkan ahli ahli yang lain beranggapan bahwa injil yang ditulis pertama adalah injil markus
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: selama 1500 tahun pertama kekristenan gereja secara mutlak meyakini bahwa keempat injil itu dalam sejarahnya ditulis sesuai urutan yang didapati dalam kanon alkitab matius yang pertama markus kedua lukas ketiga dan yohanes yang terakhir dari semuanya

lines.value: alasan mempercayai bahwa injil matius ditulis terdahulu cukup sederhana kesaksian dari para saksi kuno yang menegaskan bahwa injil matius yang pertama ditulis dan juga ditulis dalam bahasa ibrani/aram

lines.value: dalam ruang hampa foton bergerak dengan laju and consequently the magnitude of the momentum is : and the component measured along its direction of motion its helicity must be
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: these two possible helicities correspond to the two possible circular polarization states of the photon right-handed and left handed
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: to illustrate the significance of these formulae the annihilation of a particle with its antiparticle must result in the creation of at least two photons for the following reason
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: in the center of mass frame the colliding antiparticles have no net momentum whereas a single photon always has momentum
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: hence conservation of momentum requires that at least two photons are created with zero net momentum
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: the energy of the two photons or equivalently their frequency may be determined from conservation of four momentum
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: seen another way the photon can be considered as its own antiparticle
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: the reverse process pair production is the dominant mechanism by which high energy photons such as gamma rays lose energy while passing through matter
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: the classical formulae for the energy and momentum of electromagnetic radiation can be reexpressed in terms of photon events
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: for example the pressure of electromagnetic radiation on an object derives from the transfer of photon momentum per unit time and unit area to that object since pressure is force per unit area and force is the change in momentum per unit time
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: martin luther osa (; ) adalah seorang profesor teologi komponis imam dan rahib berkebangsaan jerman serta seorang tokoh berpengaruh dalam reformasi protestan
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: luther menjadi penentang beberapa ajaran dan praktik dalam gereja katolik roma
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: luther mengusulkan suatu diskusi akademis seputar praktik dan keefektifan indulgensi dalam 95 tesis karyanya tahun 1517

lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: luther mengajarkan bahwa keselamatan dan konsekuensinya kehidupan kekal tidak diperoleh dengan perbuatan perbuatan baik namun diterima oleh orang percaya semata mata sebagai anugerah bebas dari rahmat allah melalui iman dalam yesus kristus sebagai penebus dari dosa

lines.value: yayasan lembaga bantuan hukum indonesia atau disingkat ylbhi tadinya adalah lembaga bantuan hukum lbh yang didirikan atas gagasan dalam kongres persatuan advokast indonesia peradin ke iii tahun 1969
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: gagasan tersebut mendapat persetujuan dari dewan pimpinan pusat peradin melalui surat keputusan nomor 001/kep/10/1970 tanggal 26 oktober 1970 yang isi penetapan pendirian lembaga bantuan hukum/lembaga pembela umum yang mulai berlaku tanggal 28 oktober 1970
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: ketua dewan pembinanya sejak 25 april 2007 adalah toeti heraty roosseno yang terpilih menggantikan adnan buyung nasution
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: pada akhir masa baktinya toeti digantikan untuk sementara oleh todung mulya lubis dan secara definitif pada akhir 2011 dijabat oleh abdul rachman saleh mantan hakim agung yang kemudian dipilih oleh presiden susilo bambang yudhoyono menjadi jaksa agung
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: setelah beroperasi selama satu dasawarsa pada 13 maret 1980 status hukum lbh ditingkatkan menjadi yayasan lembaga bantuan hukum indonesia ylbhi dan 28 oktober tetap dijadikan sebagai hari ulang tahun ylbhi

lines.value: pada awalnya gagasan pendirian lembaga ini adalah untuk memberikan bantuan hukum bagi orang orang yang tidak mampu memperjuangkan hak haknya terutama rakyat miskin yang digusur dipinggirkan di phk dan keseharian pelanggaran atas hak hak asasi mereka

lines.value: lambat laun rezim otoriter orde baru di bawah soeharto membawa lbh menjadi salah satu subyek kunci bagi perlawanan terhadap otoriterianisme orde baru dan menjadi simpul penting bagi gerakan pro demokrasi

lines.value: prinsip prinsip bagi penegakan demokrasi hak asasi manusia dan keadilan membawa lbh ke tengah lapangan perlawanan atas ketidakadilan struktural yang dibangun dalam bingkai orde baru
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: lbh memilih untuk berada di sisi pergerakan kaum buruh petani mahasiswa kaum miskin kota dan semua kekuatan yang memperjuangkan demokrasi
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: lbh kemudian mengembangkan konsep bantuan hukum struktural bhs konsep yang didasarkan pada upaya upaya untuk mendorong terwujudnya negara hukum yang menjamin keadilan sosial dengan cara melibatkan klien untuk ikut menyelesaikan masalahnya sendiri mengorganisir diri mereka sendiri dan pada akhirnya bisa mandiri dan tidak tergantung lagi kepada pengacaranya

lines.value: konstantinos g karamanlis () 8 maret 1907 - 23 april 1998 umumnya inggris untuk constantine karamanlis atau caramanlis adalah perdana menteri selama empat kali masa jabatan yaitu kepala negara republik hellenik iii ke 3 dan 5 republik hellenik iii dan sosok populer dalam politik yunani sepanjang karier politik pada masa paruh kedua abad ke 20
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: dia terlahir di desa proti macedonia kesultanan utsmaniyah sekarang yunani
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: dia menjadi warganegara yunani pada 1913 setelah macedonia bersatu dengan yunani isetelah perang balkan kedua
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: ayahnya bernama georgios karamanlis seorang guru yang berperang ketika greek struggle for macedonia pada 1904 1908
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: setelah menghabiskan masa kecilnya di macedonia dia pergi ke athena untuk attain his degree in law
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: he practised law in serres entered politics with the conservative people's party and was elected member of parliament for the first time at the age of 28 in the greek legislative election 1936
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: due to health problems karamanlis did not participate in the greco italian war
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: after world war ii karamanlis quickly rose through the ranks of greek politics
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: his rise was strongly supported by fellow party member and close friend lambros eftaxias who served as minister for agriculture under the premiership of konstantinos tsaldaris
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karamanlis's first cabinet position was minister for employment in 1947 under the same administration
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karamanlis eventually became minister of public works in the greek rally administration under prime minister alexandros papagos
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: he won the admiration of the us embassy for the efficiency with which he built road infrastructure and administered american aid programs
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: when alexandros papagos died after a brief illness 1955 king paul of greece appointed the 48-year-old karamanlis as prime minister
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: the king did so thus bypassing stephanos stephanopoulos and panagiotis kanellopoulos the two senior greek rally politicians who were widely considered as the heavyweights most likely to succeed papagos
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karamanlis first became prime minister in 1955 and reorganized the greek rally as the national radical union
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: one of the first bills he promoted as prime minister implemented the extension of full voting rights to women which stood dormant although nominally approved in 1952
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karamanlis won three successive elections 1956 1958 and 1961
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: in 1959 he announced a five year plan 1960-64 for the greek economy emphasizing improvement of agricultural and industrial production heavy investment on infrastructure and the promotion of tourism
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: on the international front karamanlis abandoned the government's previous strategic goal for enosis the unification of greece and cyprus in favour of independence for cyprus
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: in 1958 his government engaged in negotiations with the united kingdom and turkey which culminated in the zurich agreement as a basis for a deal on the independence of cyprus
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: in 1959 the plan was ratified in london by makarios iii
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: max merten was kriegverwaltungsrat military administration counselor of the nazi german occupation forces in thessaloniki
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: he was convicted in greece and sentenced to a 25 year term as a war criminal in 1959
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: on 3 november of that year merten benefited from an amnesty for war criminals and was set free and extradited to the federal republic of germany after political and economic pressure from west germany which at the time hosted thousands of greek economic immigrants
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: merten's arrest also enraged queen frederica a woman with german ties who wondered whether this is the way mister district attorney understands the development of german and greek relations
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: in germany merten was eventually acquitted from all charges due to lack of evidence on 28 september 1960 german newspapers hamburger echo and der spiegel published excerpts of merten's deposition to the german authorities where merten claimed that karamanlis the then minister for the interior takos makris and his wife doxoula whom he described as karamanlis's niece along with then deputy minister of defense george themelis were informers during the nazi occupation of greece
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: merten alleged that karamanlis and makris were rewarded for their services with a business in thessaloniki which belonged to a greek jew sent to the auschwitz concentration camp
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: he also alleged that he had pressured karamanlis and makris to grant amnesty and release him from prison
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karamanlis rejected the claims as unsubstantiated and absurd and accused merten of attempting to extort money from him prior to making the statements
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: the west german government also decried the accusations as calumniatory and libelous
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karamanlis accused the opposition party of instigating a smear campaign against him
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: although karamanlis never pressed charges against merten charges were pressed in greece against der spiegel by takos and doxoula makris and themelis and the magazine was found guilty for slander in 1963
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: merten did not appear to testify during the greek court proceedings
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: the merten affair remained at the centre of political discussions until early 1961
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: merten's accusations against karamanlis were never corroborated in a court of law
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: historian giannis katris an ardent critic of karamanlis has argued that karamanlis should have resigned the premiership and pressed charges against merten as a private individual in german courts in order to fully clear his name
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: nonetheless katris rejects the accusations as unsubstantiated and obviously fallacious
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karamanlis as early as 1958 pursued an aggressive policy toward greek membership in the eec
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: he considered greece's entry into the eec a personal dream because he saw it as the fulfillment of what he called greece's european destiny
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: he personally lobbied european leaders such as germany's konrad adenauer and france's charles de gaulle followed by two years of intense negotiations with brussels
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: his intense lobbying bore fruit and on 9 july 1961 his government and the europeans signed the protocols of greece's treaty of association with the european economic community eec
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: the signing ceremony in athens was attended by top government delegations from the six member bloc of germany france italy belgium luxemburg and the netherlands a precursor of the european union
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: economy minister aristidis protopapadakis and foreign minister evangelos averoff were also present
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: german vice chancellor ludwig erhard and belgian foreign minister paul henri spaak a european union pioneer and a karlspreis winner like karamanlis were among the european delegates
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: this had the profound effect of ending greece's economic isolation and breaking its political and economic dependence on us economic and military aid mainly through nato
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: greece became the first european country to acquire the status of associate member of the eec outside the six nation eec group
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: in november 1962 the association treaty came into effect and envisaged the country's full membership at the eec by 1984 after the gradual elimination of all greek tariffs on eec imports
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: a financial protocol clause included in the treaty provided for loans to greece subsidised by the community of about $300 million between 1962 and 1972 to help increase the competitiveness of the greek economy in anticipation of greece's full membership
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: the community's financial aid package as well as the protocol of accession were suspended during the 1967 74 junta years and greece was expelled from the eec
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: as well during the dictatorship greece resigned its membership in the council of europe fearing embarrassing investigations by the council following torture allegations
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: soon after returning to greece during metapolitefsi karamanlis reactivated his push for the country's full eec membership in 1975 citing political and economic reasons
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karamanlis was convinced that greece's membership in the eec would ensure political stability in a nation having just undergone a transition from dictatorship to democracy
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: in may 1979 he signed the full treaty of accession
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: greece became the tenth member of the eec on 1 january 1981 three years earlier than the original protocol envisioned and despite the freezing of the treaty of accession during the junta 1967-1974
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: <!-->in the 1961 elections the national radical union won 50.80 percent of the popular vote
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: on 31 october george papandreou stated that the electoral results were due to widespread vote rigging and fraud
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karamanlis replied electoral fraud to the extent that it happened was masterminded by the palace
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: political tension escalated as papandreou refused to recognize the karamanlis government
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: on 14 november 1961 he initiated an unrelenting struggle avevδoto aywva against karamanlis
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: tension between karamanlis and the palace escalated even further as karamanlis vetoed fundraising initiatives undertaken by queen frederika
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: on 17 june 1963 karamanlis resigned the premiership after a disagreement with king paul of greece and spent four months abroad
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: in the meantime the country was in turmoil following the assassination of dr gregoris lambrakis a leftist member of parliament by right wing extremists during a pro peace demonstration in thessaloniki
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: the opposition parties castigated karamanlis as a moral accomplice to the assassination
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: in the 1963 election the national radical union under his leadership was defeated by the center union under george papandreou
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: disappointed with the result karamanlis fled greece under the name triantafyllides
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: he spent the next 11 years in self imposed exile in paris france
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karamanlis was succeeded by panagiotis kanellopoulos as the ere leader
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: in 1966 constantine ii of greece sent his envoy demetrios bitsios to paris on mission to convince karamanlis to return to greece and resume a role in greek politics
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: according to uncorroborated claims made by the former monarch only after both men had died in 2006 karamanlis replied to bitsios that he would return under the condition that the king were to impose martial law as was his constitutional prerogative
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: us journalist cyrus l sulzberger has separately claimed that karamanlis flew to new york to visit lauris norstad and lobby us support for a coup d'etat in greece that would establish a strong conservative regime under himself sulzberger alleges that norstad declined to involve himself in such affairs
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: sulzberger's account which unlike that of the former king was delivered during the lifetime of those implicated karamanlis and norstad rested solely on the authority of his and norstad's word
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: when in 1997 the former king reiterated sulzberger's allegations karamanlis stated that he will not deal with the former king's statements because both their content and attitude are unworthy of comment the deposed king's adoption of sulzberger's claims against karamanlis was castigated by left leaning media typically critical of karamanlis as shameless and brazen
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: it bears noting that at the time the former king referred exclusively to sulzberger's account to support the theory of a planned coup by karamanlis and made no mention of the alleged 1966 meeting with bitsios which he would refer to only after both participants had died and could not respond
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: on 21 april 1967 constitutional order was usurped by a coup d'etat led by officers around colonel george papadopoulos
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: the king accepted to swear in the military appointed government as the legitimate government of greece but launched an abortive counter coup to overthrow the junta eight months later
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: constantine and his family then fled the country
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: in 2001 former agents of the eastern german secret police stasi claimed to greek investigative reporters that during the cold war they had orchestrated an operation of evidence falsification in order to present constantine karamanlis as having planned a coup and thus damage his reputation in an apparent disinformation propaganda campaign
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: the operation allegedly centered on a falsified conversation between karamanlis and strauss a bavarian officer of the king
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: they also alleged that a photograph of the former new democracy leader constantine mitsotakis standing next to a uniformed nazi officer that had been repeatedly published by the pasok leaning greek daily avriani was in fact a photomontage fabricated in bulgaria
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: their disclosures have not been challenged to this day
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: following the invasion of cyprus by the turks the dictators finally abandoned ioannides and his disastrous policies
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: on 23 july 1974 president phaedon gizikis called a meeting of old guard politicians including panagiotis kanellopoulos spiros markezinis stephanos stephanopoulos evangelos averoff and others
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: the heads of the armed forces also participated in the meeting
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: the agenda was to appoint a national unity government that would lead the country to elections
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: former prime minister panagiotis kanellopoulos was originally suggested as the head of the new interim government
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: he was the interim prime minister originally deposed by the dictatorship in 1967 and a distinguished politician who had repeatedly criticized papadopoulos and his successor
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: raging battles were still taking place in cyprus north when greeks took to the streets in all the major cities celebrating the junta's decision to relinquish power before the war in cyprus could spill all over the aegean
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: but talks in athens were going nowhere with gizikis offer to panagiotis kanellopoulos to form a government
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: nonetheless after all the other politicians departed without reaching a decision evangelos averoff remained in the meeting room and further engaged gizikis
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: he insisted that karamanlis was the only political personality who could lead a successful transition government taking into consideration the new circumstances and dangers both inside and outside the country
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: gizikis and the heads of the armed forces initially expressed reservations but they finally became convinced by averoff's arguments
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: admiral arapakis was the first among the participating military leaders to express his support for karamanlis
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: after averoff's decisive intervention gizikis decided to invite karamanlis to assume the premiership
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: throughout his stay in france karamanlis was a vocal opponent of the regime of the colonels the military junta that seized power in greece in april 1967
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: now he was called to end his self imposed exile and restore democracy to the place that originally created it greece
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: upon news of his impending arrival cheering athenian crowds took to the streets chanting epxetai
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: he is coming
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: he is coming similar celebrations broke out all over greece
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: athenians in their thousands also went to the airport to greet him
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karamanlis was sworn in as prime minister under president pro tempore phaedon gizikis who remained in power in the interim till december 1974 for legal continuity reasons until a new constitution could be enacted during metapolitefsi and was subsequently replaced by duly elected president michail stasinopoulos
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: during the inherently unstable first weeks of the metapolitefsi karamanlis was forced to sleep aboard a yacht watched over by a destroyer for the fear of a new coup
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karamanlis attempted to defuse the tension between greece and turkey which were on the brink of war over the cyprus crisis through the diplomatic route
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: two successive conferences in geneva where the greek government was represented by george mavros failed to avert a full scale invasion and occupation of 37 percent of cyprus by turkey on 14 august 1974
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: the steadfast process of transition from military rule to a pluralist democracy proved successful
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: during this transition period of the metapolitefsi karamanlis legalized the communist party of greece kke that was banned decades ago
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: the legalization of the communist party was considered by many as a gesture of political inclusionism and rapprochement
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: at the same time he also freed all political prisoners and pardoned all political crimes against the junta
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: following through with his reconciliation theme he also adopted a measured approach to removing collaborators and appointees of the dictatorship from the positions they held in government bureaucracy and declared that free elections would be held in november 1974 four months after the collapse of the regime of the colonels
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: in the 1974 elections karamanlis with his newly formed conservative party named new democracy obtained a massive parliamentary majority and was elected prime minister
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: the elections were soon followed by the 1974 plebiscite on the abolition of the monarchy and the establishment of the hellenic republic the televised 1975 trials of the former dictators who received death sentences for high treason and mutiny that were later commuted to life incarceration and the writing of the 1975 constitution
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: in 1977 new democracy again won the elections and karamanlis continued to serve as prime minister until 1980
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: under karamanlis's premiership his government undertook numerous nationalizations in several sectors including banking and transportation
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karamanlis's policies of economic statism which fostered a large state run sector have been described by many as socialmania
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: following his signing of the accession treaty with the european economic community now the european union in 1979 karamanlis relinquished the premiership and was elected president of the republic in 1980 by the parliament and in 1981 he oversaw greece's formal entry into the european economic community as its tenth member
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: he served until 1985 then resigned and was succeeded by christos sartzetakis
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: in 1990 he was reelected president by a conservative parliamentary majority under the conservative government of then prime minister konstantinos mitsotakis and served until 1995 when he was succeeded by kostis stephanopoulos
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karamanlis retired in 1995 at the age of 88 having won 5 parliamentary elections and having spent 14 years as prime minister 10 years as president of the republic and a total of more than sixty years in active politics
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: for his long service to democracy and as a pioneer of european integration from the earliest stages of the european union karamanlis was awarded one of the most prestigious european prizes the karlspreis in 1978
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: he bequeathed his archives to the konstantinos karamanlis foundation a conservative think tank he had founded and endowed
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karamanlis died after a short illness in 1998 at the age of 91
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: his nephew kostas karamanlis later became the leader of the new democracy party nea demokratia and prime minister of greece from 2004 to 2009
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karamanlis has been praised for presiding over an early period of fast economic growth for greece 1955-63 and for being the primary engineer of greece's successful bid for membership in the european union
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: his supporters came to laud him as the charismatic ethnarches national leader
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: some of his left wing opponents have accused him of condoning rightist para statal groups whose members undertook via kai notheia violence and corruption i.e fraud during the electoral contests between ere and papandreou's center union party and were responsible for the assassination of gregoris lambrakis
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: some of karmanlis's conservative opponents have criticized his socialist economic policies during the 1970s which included the nationalization of olympic airways and emporiki bank and the creation of a large public sector
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karamanlis has also been criticized by ange s vlachos for indecisiveness in his management of the cyprus crisis in 1974 even though it is widely acknowledged that he skillfully avoided an all out war with turkey during that time
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karamanlis is acknowledged for his successful restoration of democracy during metapolitefsi and the repair of the two great national schisms by first legalising the communist party and by establishing the system of presidential democracy in greece
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karamanlis policy of european integration is also acknowledged to have ended the paternalistic relation between greece and the united states
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: on 29 june 2005 an audio visual tribute celebrating konstantinos karamanlis contribution to greek culture took place at the odeon of herodes atticus
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: george remoundos was the stage director and stavros xarhakos conducted and selected the music
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: the event under the title of cultural memories was organised by the konstantinos g karamanlis foundation
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: in 2007 several events were held to celebrate 100 years since his birth

lines.value: alun alun trafalgar adalah sebuah alun alun di bagian tengah london yang dinamakan untuk mengenang pertempuran trafalgar 1805 sebuah pertempuran di laut di mana kapal perang angkatan laut inggris memenangkan perang napoleon

lines.value: buku tahun 1972 the mind of adolf hitler karya psikolog walter c langer menyebut rudolf hess sebagai homoseksual terkenal yang mungkin menjadi pasangan hitler.dalam buku tahun 2001 the hidden hitler karya sejarawan dan profesor universitas bremen lothar machtan tertulis bahwa hitler tertarik oleh sikap kewanita wanitaan rudolf hess yang kini disebut sebagai fraulein hess otto strasser fraulein anna atau fraulein gusti ernst hanfstaengl paula hitam dikaitkan dengan ernst rohm grete hitam bella fromm dan emma hitam erich ebermayer

lines.value: manusia piltdown eoanthropus dawsoni adalah sebuah penipuan yang mungkin dilakukan oleh charles dawson dan atau orang orang lainnya terhadap para paleontologis dari november 1912 hingga terbongkar pada tahun 1953

lines.value: penemuan ini dianggap oleh para palentologis inggris sebagai suatu kunci pembukti hubungan antara kera dengan manusia karena adanya kranium bagian tulang yang membungkus otak yang mirip milik manusia dan rahang berbentuk seperti rahang kera

lines.value: bersama sebastian vettel dan lewis hamilton prost menjadi salah satu pembalap yang meraih gelar juara dunia terbanyak selain juan manuel fangio 5 gelar dan michael schumacher 7 gelar

lines.value: ayrton senna lantas bergabung dengan prost di mclaren pada tahun 1988 dan keduanya kemudian memiliki rivalitas yang tinggi yang sering kali berbau kontroversial termasuk tabrakan di grand prix jepang 1989 yang memberikan prost gelar juara dunia untuk ketiga kalinya

lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karl paul reinhold niebuhr 21 juni 1892 - 11 juni 1971 adalah seorang teolog protestan asal amerika serikat yang terkenal karena penelitiannya mengenai tugas dalam menghubungkan iman kristen dengan realitas politik modern dan diplomasi
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: ia merupakan penyumbang penting terhadap pemikiran mengenai perang yang sah
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: niebuhr dilahirkan di wright city missouri as anak seorang pendeta gereja injili jerman gustav dan saudara laki laki dari helmut richard niebuhr
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: niebuhr memutuskan untuk mengikuti jejak ayahnya dan menjadi pendeta
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: ia belajar di elmhurst college illinois dan di situ kini ditempatkan sebuah patung besar dirinya
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: ia lulus pada 1910 dan kemudian melanjutkan ke seminari eden st louis missouri
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: akhirnya ia belajar di universitas yale dan mendapatkan gelar sarjana teologinya pada 1914
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: pada 1915 ia ditahbiskan menjadi pendeta
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: dewan misi gereja injili jerman kemudian mengutusnya untuk melayani di detroit
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: anggota gerejanya berjumlah 65 orang ketika ia tiba di sana dan bertambah hingga hampir 700 orang ketika ia pindah dari sana
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: pertumbuhannya sebagian disebabkan oleh perkembangan luar biasa dari industri mobil di kota itu
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: ketika ia menjadi pendeta niebuhr merasa terganggu oleh akibat akibat industrialisme yang menghancurkan moral para buruhnya
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: ia menjadi kritik yang vokal terhadap henry ford dan membiarkan para aktivis serikat buruh menggunakan mimbarnya untuk menyampaikan pesan mereka tentang hak hak kaum buruh
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: niebuhr mencatat kondisi kondisi yang tidak manusiawi yang dihasilkan oleh barisan assembling dan praktik praktik perburuhan yang sangat merugikan
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: pada 1923 niebuhr mengunjungi eropa untuk bertemu dengan sejumlah intelektual dan teolog
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: kondisi kondisi yang disaksikannya di jerman di bawah penduduk prancis membuat niebuhr cemas dan memperkuat pandangan pandangan pasifis yang dianutnya karena muak terhadap perang dunia i pada 1928 niebuhr menjadi professor teologi praktika di seminari teologi union di new york
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: sebelum tiba di seminari itu niebuhr menuliskan makna pengalaman pribadinya di gerejanya di detroit dalam bukunya leaves from the notebook of a tamed cynic lembaran-lembaran catatan dari seorang sinis yang dijinakkan
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: sementara mengajar teologi di seminari teologi union niebuhr dipengaruhi oleh dietrich bonhoeffer dari gereja yang mengaku yang anti nazi pada tahun 1930-an niebuhr menjadi seorang pemimpin terkemuka dari fraksi militan partai sosialis amerika dan menganjurkan agar agenda front bersatu dari partai komunis as diterima
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: posisi ini sangat berlawanan dengan posisi yang kelak menjadi cirinya dalam kariernya
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: pada saat perang dunia ii pecah kecenderungan pasifis dari akar liberalnya mendapatkan tantangan dan ia mulai menjauhkan diri dari pasifisme rekanrekannya yang lebih liberal dan menjadi pendukung perang yang gigih
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: tak lama kemudian niebuhr meninggalkan persekutuan rekonsiliasi sebuah kelompok berorientasi damai dari teolog dan pendeta dan menjadi salah seorang pengkritiknya yang paling tajam

lines.value: tindakan niebuhr meninggalkan teman temannya ini berkembang menjadi suatu gerakan yang dikenal sebagai realisme kristen dan niebuhr diakui sebagai salah satu pendukungnya yang utama

lines.value: boniface alexandre lahir tahun 1936 adalah presiden sementara haiti sejak tahun 2004 setelah terjadi kudeta yang menyingkirkan presiden jean bertrand aristide pada 29 februari 2004
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: alexandre yang saat itu menjabat sebagai ketua mahkamah agungpun mengisi kekosongan jabatan presiden
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: pada februari 2006 ia menyerahkan jabatannya kepada bekas presiden hati pada tahun 1996 hingga 2001 rene preval yang terpilih pada pemilu 2006
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: alexandre was raised by his uncle former haitian prime minister martial celestin
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: he trained as a lawyer and worked for 25 years for cabinet lamarre a port au prince law firm specializing in business contracts and divorce settlements
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: in the 1990s alexandre was appointed to haiti's supreme court and in 2002 president jean bertrand aristide appointed him chief justice
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: as chief justice he had a reputation for fairness in a judicial system widely regarded as corrupt
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: he has promised to fight incompetence and corruption in the courts of haiti
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: on april 25 2003 alexandre was made an honorary citizen of lafayette louisiana usa
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: alexandre also teaches at the university of port au prince
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: boniface alexandre assumed the presidency of haiti a few hours after the removal and exile of president jean bertrand aristide who left the country in the face of an internal uprising and international pressure
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: alexandre was sworn in on the morning of february 29 2004 in a brief ceremony at the home of prime minister yvon neptune
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: although alexandre holds the position of acting president the haitian constitution in article 149 calls for him to be confirmed by the haitian parliament which has not met since january 2004 when the terms of most legislators expired
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: under the haitian constitution new presidential elections must be held between 45 and 90 days after aristide's resignation and alexandre as acting president would not be allowed to run in those elections
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: furthermore he has made known his personal unwillingness to remain any longer than necessary as interim president as has the interim prime minister gerard latortue concerning his own unwillingness to reside any longer as head of government
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: although alexandre had close ties to former president aristide he was not a member of aristide's lavalas party
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: following his assumption to the presidency political opponents of aristide suggested that he was too closely associated with the previous regime and that as chief justice he was not active enough in declaring the court's independence from the executive branch of the government
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: one of alexandre's first acts as president was to submit an official request to the united nations security council asking for a multinational peacekeeping force to restore order in haiti
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: the security council quickly approved this request
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: although rebel leaders including guy philippe indicate their willingness to work with alexandre as acting president us officials initially played down alexandre's importance in the resolution of the haitian conflict calling alexandre's administration a caretaker government
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: alexandre was officially inaugurated as president on 8 march
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: in his first presidential speech he called for national reconciliation the establishment of a climate of peace and security for all and an emergency plan to counter hunger and poverty and to improve health gerard latortue was named prime minister of haiti by the council of sages a committee of prominent haitians on 10 march replacing yvon neptune
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: during his interim presidency alexandre's 16-month-old granddaughter charlotte alexandre drowned accidentally in a bathtub at the presidential palace while visiting from france with her family
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: alexandre has four children
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: berdasarkan peraturan bupati aceh selatan nomor 14 tahun 2008 tentang uraian tugas jabatan struktural pada organisasi dan tata kerja kecamatan dalam kabupaten aceh selatan kecamatan labuhanhaji kabupaten aceh selatan adalah wilayah kerja camat sebagai perangkat daerah kabupaten aceh selatan yang berada dibawah dan bertanggung jawab kepada bupati aceh selatan melalui sekretaris daerah
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: kecamatan merupakan sebuah satuan kerja perangkat kabupaten skpk sebagaimana yang diamanatkan dalam peraturan pemerintah nomor 08 tahun 2008 tentang tahapan tata cara penyusunan evaluasi pelaksanaan rencana pembangunan daerah
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: sesuai peraturan bupati aceh selatan nomor 14 tahun 2008 camat mempunyai tugas melaksanakan wewenang pemerintah yang dilimpahkan oleh bupati untuk menangani sebagian urusan otonomi daerah
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: untuk dapat menjalankan tugas yang telah dibebankan kecamatan labuhanhaji kabupaten aceh selatan dipimpin oleh camat yang dibantu oleh satu sekretaris kecamatan lima seksi dan tiga sub bagian
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: < tidak perlu ditampilkan di sini melainkan di bagian camat secara garis besar pelaksanaan tugas pokok camat dan masing masing seksi serta sub bagian adalah sebagai berikut : a
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: camat mempunyai tugas membantu bupati dalam rangka melaksanakan tugas penyelenggaraan pemerintahan pembangunan dan pembinaan kehidupan kemasyarakatan dalam wilayah kecamatan
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: dalam melaksanakan tugas sebagaimana dimaksud camat mempunyai fungsi penyelenggaraan tugas tugas pemerintahan umum dan pembinaan keagrariaan serta pembinaan sosial politik dalam negeri pembinan pemerintahan gampong pembinaan ketentraman dan ketertiban wilayah kecamatan pembinaan pembangunan yang meliputi pembinaan perekonomian produksi retribusi serta pembinaan sosial
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: b sekretaris kecamatan mempunyai tugas melaksanakan pembinaan dan memberikan pelayanan teknis administrasi kepada seluruh satuan organisasi sekretariat kecamatan yang berkedudukan di bawah dan bertanggung jawab kepada camat
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: c seksi pemerintahan mempunyai tugas melakukan urusan pemerintahan umum dan pembinaan pemerintahan gampong yang berkedudukan di bawah dan bertanggung jawab kepada camat
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: d seksi ketentraman dan ketertiban umum mempunyai tugas melakukan pembinaan ketentraman ketertiban wilayah pembinaan idiologi dan politik dalam negeri yang berkedudukan di bawah dan bertanggung jawab kepada camat
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: e seksi pembangunan masyarakat gampong mempunyai tugas melakukan perencanaan dan penyusunan program serta melakukan pengendalian dan pembinaan pembangunan yang berkedudukan di bawah dan bertanggung jawab kepada camat
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: f seksi kesejahteraan sosial mempunyai tuags mengkoordinasikan penyusunan program dan melaksanakan pembinaan kesejahteraan sosial yang berkedudukan di bawah dan bertanggung jawab kepada camat
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: g seksi pelayanan umum mempunyai tugas melakukan urusan pelayanan umum yang meliputi pelayanan kependudukan kebersihan dan perizinan yang berkedudukan di bawah dan bertanggung jawab kepada camat
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: h sub bagian umum mempunyai tugas ketatausahaan dalam pelaksanaan kegiatan sekretariat sesuai dengan ketentuan yang berlaku untuk mendukung kelancaran tugas pokok bagian sekretariat pada kecamatan
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: i sub bagian kepegawaian dan tatalaksana mempunyai tugas melakukan pembinaan administrasi dan memberi pelayanan teknis administrasi kepada seluruh satuan organisasi sekretaris kecamatan yang berkedudukan dan bertanggung jawab kepada camat
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: j sub bagian keuangan mempunyai tugas memimpin sub bagian keuangan dalam pelaksanaan kegiatan teknis dan administrasi keuangan sesuai dengan ketentuan yang berlaku untuk mendukung kelancaran administrasi kecamatan
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: beji timur adalah sebuah kelurahan yang terletak di kecamatan beji kota depok jawa barat indonesia
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: pada awal sebelum berdirinya universitas indonesia di depok kelurahan beji timur masih merupakan lahan perkebunan dan empang milik warga setempat dan sebagian besar tidak ber tuan milik negara
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: ketika pada akhirnya proyek pembangunan universitas indonesia di depok dilaksanakan maka sebagai kompensasi penggantian atas lahan warga yang terkena proyek tersebut diberikanlah sejumlah uang dan lahan kapling di daerah kelurahan beji timur ini
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: lahan penggantian di daerah beji timur ini tertata dalam blok blok dan kapling kapling yang cukup rapih dengan luas lahan perkapling nya kurang lebih 500 m 2
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: karena itu sampai sekarang ini kelurahan beji timur lebih dikenal oleh warga setempat dengan nama tanah kapling
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: untuk kelengkapan daerah tersebut kel beji timur pemerintah juga menyediakan fasum berupa satu lapangan bola satu sekolahan satu puskesmas satu posyandu dan satu masjid
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: bahkan saat ini tempat tersebut sudah sedemikian berkembang nya sehingga telah berdiri bangunan fasum yang baru berupa gereja masjid dan beberapa sekolah swasta
lines.name: Indonesian

lines.value: selain sebagai kawasan hunian warga eks gusuran ui kelurahan beji timur juga ditempati oleh penduduk lama sebelum gusuran dosen poltek ui sekelompok pensiunan karyawan pemerintah sebagai warga pendatang yang membeli tanah warga setempat sekelompok orang dari perusahaan tertentu yang mendirikan hunian untuk karyawannya beberapa keluarga pasangan muda dan selebihnya ± 25% adalah penduduk musiman yang merupakan mahasiswa kost dari universitas indonesia dan universitas gunadarma

lines.value: moore 1941 h 179 menyatakan bahwa stratigrafi adalah cabang ilmu geologi yang membahas tentang definisi dan pemerian kelompok kelompok batuan terutama batuan sedimen serta penafsiran kebenaannya dalam sejarah geologi menurut schindewolf 1954 h 24 stratigrafi bukan schichtbeschreibung melainkan sebuah cabang geologi sejarah yang membahas tentang susunan batuan menurut umurnya serta tentang skala waktu dari berbagai peristiwa geologi schindewolf 1960 h 8

lines.value: teichert 1958 h 99 menyajikan sebuah ungkapan yang lebih kurang sama dalam mendefinisikan stratigrafi sebagai cabang ilmu geologi yang membahas tentang strata batuan untuk menetapkan urut urutan kronologinya serta penyebaran geografisnya sebagian besar ahli stratigrafi perancis juga tidak terlalu menekankan komposisi batuan sebagai sebuah domain dari stratigrafi sigal 1961 h 3).definisi istilah stratigrafi telah dibahas pada pertemuan international geological congress di copenhagen pada 1960
